Question: ECOVACS Robotics Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ECOVACS Robotics Inc.

Product 1

DEEBOT X2 COMBO

- Matter-ready robot vacuum and mop
- Upgraded hands-free capabilities and precision for cleaning floors, drapes, and ceilings
- Includes handheld stick vacuum for whole-home cleaning
- 8000Pa suction power and pressurized OZMO Turbo 2.0 mopping system
- Industry-first embedded navigation system, True Detect 3D 2.0 for precision obstacle avoidance, and Matter 1.2 compatibility
- Dual dust collection all-in-one base station for hands-free maintenance

Product 2

WINBOT W2 OMNI

- Advanced, intelligent navigation system for hands-free window cleaning
- Three-nozzle wide-angle spray technology and 10-tier protection system
- Four cleaning modes: Fast, Deep, Spot, and Custom
- Suitcase-style multi-functional station with drop protection mechanisms and built-in battery

Product 3

GOAT GX 600

- Robotic lawn mower with combined vision and SmartMove technology
- Automatically distinguishes natural lawn boundaries and uses AIVI 3D obstacle avoidance technology
- Outdoor charging station and easy installation
- Available in the US from ECOVACS.com/US in Spring 2024
Summary_cn:
ECOVACS Robotics Inc.

产品1

DEEBOT X2 COMBO

- 准备好与Matter配合使用的机器人吸尘器和拖地器
- 升级的无需使用手的功能和精确清洁地板、窗帘和天花板的能力
- 包括便携式手持式吸尘器，用于全屋清洁
- 8000Pa的吸力和加压的OZMO Turbo 2.0擦地系统
- 行业首个内嵌导航系统，精准避开障碍物的True Detect 3D 2.0技术，以及Matter 1.2兼容性
- 双重集尘一体底座，方便无需使用手的维护

产品2

WINBOT W2 OMNI

- 先进的智能导航系统，实现无需使用手的窗户清洁
- 三喷嘴宽角喷雾技术和10层防护系统
- 四种清洁模式：快速、深度、点缀和自定义
- 类似手提箱的多功能站，具有防护机制和内置电池

产品3

GOAT GX 600

- 具备视觉和SmartMove技术的机器人割草机
- 自动识别天然草坪边界，并使用AIVI 3D避障技术
- 室外充电站和易安装
- 2024年春季，在ECOVACS.com/US网站上可在美国购买
